# 2. Offence - Subgroup

```{r}
data_tutorail <- data_tutorail |>
  select("Offence.Subgroup", "Incidents.Recorded")
```

```{r}
data_tutorail$Incidents.Recorded <- as.numeric(data_tutorail$Incidents.Recorded)
```

```{r}
data_tutorail <- data_tutorail |>
  group_by(`Offence.Subgroup`) |>
  summarise(Total_Incidents.Recorded = sum(Incidents.Recorded))

data_tutorail$Total_Incidents.Recorded[is.na(data_tutorail$Total_Incidents.Recorded)] <- 0
```
